allow: Bash(cmd.exe /c "py -c ""import joblib; model = joblib.load\(''diabetes_model.sav''\); scaler = joblib.load\(''scaler.sav''\); print\(''Model:'', type\(model\).__name__\); print\(''Scaler:'', type\(scaler\).__name__\); print\(''Features:'', scaler.n_features_in_ if hasattr\(scaler, ''n_features_in_''\) else ''unknown''\); print\(''Feature names:'', list\(scaler.feature_names_in_\) if hasattr\(scaler, ''feature_names_in_''\) else ''not available''\)""")
